mail.subject: Your Cairn.info account has been modified.
mail.body:
Sir/Madam,
Your Cairn.info account has been modified. Here are your new signing-in details : Login : [TO] Password : (your chosen password).
If you need any further assistance, please visit our customer service pages using the contact form at http://www.cairn-int.info/contact.php. You may also find answers to your questions in our online help pages at http://www.cairn-int.info/help.php.
Thank you.
Cairn.info Chercher. Repérer. Avancer ----------------------- Cairn S.A. 58/60, rue des Champs B-4020 Liège BELGIUM General terms of sale: http://www.cairn-int.info/conditions.php
